```
  âœ… = Success / Enabled
  âŒ = Failure / Blocked
  â†“  = Sequential step
  â†’  = Result/Output
  â”œâ”€ = Branch/Option
  â””â”€ = End of branch
```

## Quick Reference

### Trigger Conditions

| Workflow | Automatic Triggers | Manual Trigger |
|----------|-------------------|----------------|
| CI | PR, Push to main/develop | âœ… |
| CD | Push to main | âœ… |
| Pages | Push to main | âœ… |
| Security | Weekly, pubspec changes | âœ… |

### Typical Execution Times

| Workflow | Cold Start | With Cache | Artifacts |
|----------|-----------|------------|-----------|
| CI | ~8-10 min | ~4-6 min | web-build (7d) |
| CD | ~10-12 min | ~6-8 min | web/APK (30d) |
| Pages | ~6-8 min | ~3-5 min | Live site |
| Security | ~6-8 min | ~3-4 min | Reports (30d) |

### Exit Codes

- `0` = Success (workflow passes)
- `1` = Analysis/Test failure (workflow fails)
- `2` = Build failure (workflow fails)

### Key URLs

- **Actions**: `https://github.com/alexcerezo/flutter-test/actions`
- **Live App**: `https://alexcerezo.github.io/flutter-test/`
- **Releases**: `https://github.com/alexcerezo/flutter-test/releases`
